decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The temporary ice rink hereby permitted shall be removed and the temporary use discontinued, with the land restored to its former condition, on or before 31 January 2020, including removal of any fixtures or fittings that facilitate the temporary use. 

Reason: The type of structure is not such as the local planning authority is prepared to approve, other than for a limited period, in view of its appearance. The permanent retention of the structure would be contrary to the requirements of policies D1 and D2 of the London Borough of Camden Local Plan 2017. 
Condition : 2 - The use of the ice rink hereby permitted shall not be carried out outside the following times 10:00am to 22:00pm Monday to Sunday.

Reason: To safeguard the amenities of the adjoining premises and the area generally in accordance with the requirements of policies A1, A4 , TC2 and TC4 of the London Borough of Camden Local Plan 2017. 
Condition : 3 - No music shall be played in association with the use of the ice rink in such a way as to be audible within any neighbouring residential properties.

Reason: To safeguard the amenities of the adjoining premises and the area generally in accordance with the requirements of policies A1, A4 , TC2 and TC4 of the London Borough of Camden Local Plan 2017.
description: Temporary installation of an Ice Rink in the North Yard, Stables Market for two months from November 2019 until January 2020 (retrospective).
